content: large sunflower this pattern was created to be used to decorate an outdoor fence as a yarn bombing it s made to hold its shape and hold up to the elements hook j 6 mm yarn worsted 4 2 strands held together i used caron one pound and red heart super saver a stiff not too soft yarn helps it hold its shape better 92 total yards combo a brown and country rose caron combo b bright yellow and sunflower yellow caron 1 stitch marker finished size 9 across gauge is not critical but keep your gauge snug special stitches treble_crochet 2 decrease triple 2 together *yo twice insert hook in stitch pull up a loop yo pull thru 2 loops yo pull thru 2 loops* 2 loops on hook repeat from * to * 1 more time yo and pull through all 3 loops on hook pic3 3 chain picot chain 3 slip_stitch into 1st chain qd 2 decrease quadruple crochet 2 together i m calling this a quadruple as it is one loop taller than a triple *yo 3 times insert hook in stitch pull up a loop -
